Razaundra's Lash.name: Razaundra's Lash
Razaundra's Lash.flavor: A red lash appears in your hand, laying into your foes and leaving them in anguish.
Razaundra's Lash.onHit: 1d10 + Charisma modifier damage, and the target is weakened until the end of your next turn. You gain a +5 bonus to the damage roll if you are bloodied.

Open the Dark Floodgates.name: Open the Dark Floodgates
Open the Dark Floodgates.flavor: The rage that wells up inside you is a dark storm whose force is felt by you and your foe alike.
Open the Dark Floodgates.onHit: 2d8 + Charisma modifier necrotic damage, and the target is stunned (save ends). You are dazed until the end of your next turn.
Open the Dark Floodgates.aftereffect: The target is dazed (save ends). While the target is dazed by this aftereffect, your attacks must include the nearest enemy that you can see. In addition, you gain a +2 power bonus to attack rolls and a +5 power bonus to damage rolls.
Open the Dark Floodgates.onMiss: Half damage, and the target is dazed (save ends).
